types.name: Personal
types.description: These Fireworks are designated for use by the general public.

types.name: Professional
types.description: These Fireworks require special licenses to purchase.

types.name: Industrial
types.description: These Fireworks are for use in large scale displays and require government code officials to sign off on all orders.

types.name: Simple
types.description: Simple click and boom explosives for simple roadrunners.

types.name: Elaborate
types.description: A step up from simple, Elaborate explosive have similar explosive power to our Simple road runner hunting explosives, but we combine other acme products to make the firing trigger more convoluted.

types.name: Show-Ending
types.description: For when that road runner keeps getting away and you just want to burn the whole valley.
